A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie could have been soo much better. Any movie could be really but Last Jedi was a disgrace and kind of ruined my hope for the series future. Disney really needs to listen to the fans\, they can't keep going like this. ?\, Luke was ruined and wasted\, Snoke wasted\, Rey's backstory wasted\, Kylo's character development wasted\, FInn had no development\, Fisher's exit wasted.
